snippet: MENDELSON--David, 80, on February 13, 2016. Services will be held at 11:30am, Tuesday, February 16, at Bernheim Apter Kreitzman, Livingston, NJ. Interment in Cedar Park Cemetery. A more detailed obituary can be found at: bernheimapter kreitzman.com 1/3
lead_paragraph: MENDELSON--David, 80, on February 13, 2016. Services will be held at 11:30am, Tuesday, February 16, at Bernheim Apter Kreitzman, Livingston, NJ. Interment in Cedar Park Cemetery. A more detailed obituary can be found at: bernheimapter kreitzman.com 1/3
